sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"阻止，阻塞"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: block, bar, hinder, obstruct, prevent, hamper
means: block ： 语气强烈，指有效堵住了通道，使人或物无法通过。
bar ： 含义与block很接近，指阻塞通道或禁止出入，但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
hinder ： 语气较轻，多指阻碍、拖延人或事，强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
obstruct ： 正式用词，语气强，多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通，使不能自由畅通。
prevent ： 含义广泛，指采取预防措施或设置障碍去阻止某人或某事。
hamper ： 侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。

sentence.Network_en: Claire positioned herself so as not to obstruct David's line of sight.
sentence.Network_cn: 克莱尔为了不挡住戴维的视线挪了一下位置。

sentence.Network_en: A number of local people have been arrested for trying to obstruct lorries loaded with logs.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些当地人因试图阻止满载原木的卡车通行而被逮捕。

sentence.Network_en: The defences are intended to obstruct any advance by tanks and other vehicles.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些防御工事用于阻止坦克等车辆前进。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2011考研英语新增大纲词汇 - 豆丁网 ... obsession n. 缠住，被困扰；观念固执，死脑筋 obstruct vt. 阻隔；阻挡 opt vi. 挑选，选择.
梗字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 草本植物的枝茎〖 stalk〗 阻塞;阻碍〖 obstruct;hinder〗 假借为“抗”。抵御;抗拒〖 resist〗.
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... obligation（ 义务，责任）； obstruct（ 阻挠，妨碍）； buy（ 买）；.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... obstinate 顽固的 obstruct 阻隔 obstruction 障碍.

list.abs: 打高尔夫球有哪些专业术语？ - 高尔夫百科 ... Niblick 铁投球杆(九号铁杆) OBSTRUCTION: 障碍物（obstruction） OFFICIAL: 大会人员.
翻译与翻译辅助工具--&gt;数理相关[转帖] ... 族参数||family parameter 阻碍||obstruction 阻碍闭上链||obstruction cocycle.
呼吸中止、呼吸暂止 Apnea阻塞性 obstructive中枢性 central
progress on self - care of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease patients in stable stage ., 慢性阻塞性肺疾病缓解期病人自我护理进展.
在妨碍物(obstructions)的定义中明确指出:界外桩为球场上固定的物体,并不是妨碍物,既不能移动也不能采取immovable obstruction 的解.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin obstruct- 'blocked up', from the verb obstruere, from ob- 'against' + struere 'build, pile up'

entry.def: If something obstructs a road or path, it blocks it, stopping people or vehicles getting past.

example.ex: Tractors and container lorries have completely obstructed the road.
example.tran: 拖拉机和集装箱货车已经将这条路完全堵死了。

entry.def: To obstruct someone or something means to make it difficult for them to move forward by blocking their path.

example.ex: A number of local people have been arrested for trying to obstruct lorries loaded with logs...
example.tran: 一些当地人因试图阻止满载原木的卡车通行而被逮捕。

example.ex: Drivers who park their cars illegally, particularly obstructing traffic flow, deserve to be punished.
example.tran: 非法停车的司机，尤其是那些阻断交通的，应当予以惩处。

entry.def: To obstruct progress or a process means to prevent it from happening properly.

example.ex: The authorities are obstructing a United Nations investigation.
example.tran: 当局正在阻挠联合国的调查。

entry.def: If someone or something obstructs your view, they are positioned between you and the thing you are trying to look at, stopping you from seeing it properly.

example.ex: Claire positioned herself so as not to obstruct David's line of sight.
example.tran: 克莱尔为了不挡住戴维的视线挪了一下位置。

means.word_mean: 1. hinder or prevent the progress or accomplishment of;

sentences.sentence: "His brother blocked him at every turn"

means.word_mean: 3. shut out from view or get in the way so as to hide from sight;

sentences.sentence: "The thick curtain blocked the action on the stage"
"The trees obstruct my view of the mountains"

auth_sentence.content: Neither party should delay or obstruct every single bill just because they can.
auth_sentence.res_content: Neither party should delay or obstruct every single bill just because they can.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Neither party should delay or obstruct every single bill just because they can.

auth_sentence.content: However, critics fear that investment groups will obstruct moves to greater transparency.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, critics fear that investment groups will obstruct moves to greater transparency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, critics fear that investment groups will obstruct moves to greater transparency.

auth_sentence.content: This will provoke retaliation, counter-campaigns, intense lobbying for Washington to obstruct reform.
auth_sentence.res_content: This will provoke retaliation, counter-campaigns, intense lobbying for Washington to obstruct reform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This will provoke retaliation, counter-campaigns, intense lobbying for Washington to obstruct reform.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可破坏的, 易毁坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: destruct破坏+ible能……的→adj.可破坏的, 易毁坏的
destruct破坏+ive……的→adj.破坏性
industry工业, 产业+ial……的→industrial
industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ive表形容词→adj.有益的, 教育性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
stems_affixes.word_buile: instrument[n.工具,仪器,器械;乐器]+al……的→adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
obstruct[v.阻隔,阻塞[道路,通道等]n.阻碍物,障碍物]+ion表名词→n.妨碍,障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
stems_affixes.word_buile: construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]+ion表名词→n.建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
destruct破坏+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
stems_affixes.word_buile: indu=in+str=struct建立,结构+y→n.工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ion表名词→n.教授;指导;[n.]用法说明[书],操作指南
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+struct建立,结构+ion表名词→建造在下面
super上面+structure结构→上面的结构→上层建筑
con共同+struct建立,结构→共同建立→建设,建造
de坏+stroy=struct建立,结构→v.破坏,摧毁,消灭
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
in进+struct建立,结构→把知识建立进去→指导,指示
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

sentences.en: He was charged for obstructing the highway.
sentences.cn: 他因阻碍交通而受控告。

sentences.en: Tall trees obstructed his view of the road.
sentences.cn: 有大树挡着, 他看不到道路。

jushi.english: Your car is obstructing my way out.
jushi.chinese: 你的车堵住我出去的路了。

jushi.english: Tall trees obstructed his view of the road.
jushi.chinese: 有大树挡着，他看不到道路。

jushi.english: He was charged for obstructing the highway.
jushi.chinese: 他因阻碍交通而受控告。
